text: Six Flags Discovery Kingdom is a 135-acre (55 ha) animal theme park located in Vallejo, California. The park includes a variety of roller coasters and other amusement rides. It has a collection of animal exhibits and shows. Discovery Kingdom has been part of the Six Flags chain of amusement parks since 1999. == References== Category:Six Flags amusement parks Category:Theme parks in California Category:Vallejo, California Category:1968 establishments in California
title: Six Flags Discovery Kingdom
